name: Barely Christmas
description:
Barely Christmas, is a mix of First person shooter and Tower defense. This christmas-themed game features the following gameplay elements:

Low-poly graphics
Physics-based shooting
Shop and multiple weapons
Snowmen with bazookas
And many more

Please be aware, that this is a very first alpha of this game, so don't expect too much. We're going to add much more content, for example turrets, traps and much more in future. 

Follow us on Twitter and stay tuned: https://twitter.com/Pixel_Feather
